Sheila McLean, Plaintiff,
v.
Bank of America, N.A., Nationstar Mortgage LLC, and Wells Fargo Bank, N.A., solely in its capacity as trustee for the Securitized Asset Backed Receivables, LLC 2005-FR5 Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2005-FR5, Defendants. No. COA16-97 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: November 1, 2016

AFFIRMED.
